levels.details: The Ralf process has been restored to normal operation.

Monit has detected that the Ralf process has failed. A restart will automatically be attempted. If this alarm does not clear, the Ralf process may have been stopped or an unrecoverable failure may have occurred.
Ralf has re-established connection with Astaire.

Ralf has failed to make a connection with the Astaire processes in the cluster. If this alarm does not clear, network connection may have been lost, or the Astaire processes may have failed and be in an unrecoverable condition.
Ralf communication to at least one Chronos has been restored.

Ralf is unable to contact any Chronos's. It will periodically attempt to reconnect. If this alarm does not clear, investigate the health of the Chronos cluster and ensure that at least the local Chronos mode is operational.
Ralf communication to at least one CDF has been restored.

Ralf is unable to contact any CDFs. It will periodically attempt to reconnect. If this alarm does not clear, ensure that at least one HSS is operational and that network connectivity exists between it and Ralf.
Ralf has re-established connection with remote Astaires.
levels.description: Ralf: Remote Astaire communication error cleared

levels.details: Ralf has failed to make a connection with the Astaire processes in a remote cluster. If this alarm does not clear, network connection may have been lost, or the Astaire processes may have failed and be in an unrecoverable condition.
